about_the_game:
This soundtrack is an original composition by SCNTFC for the game Old Man's Journey.

Track List


1. The Beginning [03:49]
2. Top of the Town [02:09]
3. Into The Water [04:01]
4. Oceanside [02:22]
5. Carry Me Far [04:33]
6. Longview [03:39]
7. The Island [02:58]
8. Two Towers, Stonewall, The Bridge [11:04]
9. The Fall Parts I and II [07:27]
10. The Last Step [03:29]
11. The End [03:50]
12. End Credits [02:31]

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 127 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 508 MB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
